name: Ancient Dungeon VR Alpha
description: A pretty basic alpha version that shows the current progress of Ancient Dungeon VR. Feel free to test it out. Tested on HTC Vive. If you use another Headset I can't guarantee that everything works correctly. If you want to get more infos during the development or want to report bugs, feel free to join the discord: https://discord.gg/h55qm34
